description.ko: 완벽한 기하학적 형태가 디지털 파편의 복잡한 폭풍으로 산산조각 나는 모습을 통해 질서 속의 혼돈을 탐구합니다.
description.en: A study of chaos within order, depicting a perfect geometric form shattered into a complex storm of digital fragments.

prompt: A brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian monolith undergoing a violent geometric deconstruction. Sharp, recursive #808080 and #C0C0C0 polygonal shards are frozen in mid-explosion against a clinical #FFFFFF vacuum. Intense digital glitch artifacts, scanlines, and chromatic aberration cut through the composition. High-contrast cinematic lighting reveals razor-sharp raytraced reflections on fragmented glass-like surfaces. 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 aesthetic, precise chaos.
